page.title: 18HOW I SPEND MY SPARE TIME
page.content: In my spare time I play cricket with my two brothers, or go to the library. On Sunday I go Sunday School with my friends. Yesterday I went Sunday School, we had our Sport day. It was fun and I came 1st. in 2 races. I really enjoy gong to Sunday school because we learn about Jesus. At home I work for a few minutes and go to play in my garden. On my road it is rather narrow, and my garden is very big. I don't like my road because it is so narrow and you can't hardly park on it. In my garden there are two separate parts, one is for planting vegetables, and the other for playing. I have planted some Garlic and it has fully grown. I really enjoy doing gardening because there is so much to do.
